00035 void
00036 ears::Model2::init()
00037 {
00038   LOG( logINFO ) << "Initializing Model 2";
00039   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "version 1.05 (last mod. 2010-01-18)";
00040 
00041   // smoothing  
00042   initSmoothing();
00043   smoothSupportFile_ = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "smoothSupportFile" );
00044 
00045   // top documents
00046   topDocNum_ = lemur::api::ParamGetInt( "topDocNum", 0 );
00047   
00048   init_ = true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 
00054 void
00055 ears::Model2::setSmoothingAuto()
00056 {
00057   // smoothingParam_ holds Dirichlet's beta, where \beta = (\sum_d n(d)) / |d|,
00058   // i.e., the average document length
00059   smoothingParam_ = (double) index_.docLengthAvg();  
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 
00065 ears::ASSOCRES_T
00066 ears::Model2::scoreAll()
00067 {
00068   lemur::api::DOCID_T docID;
00069   int entityNum = entities_.entityNum();
00070   int queryNum = queries_.queryNum();
00071 
00072   // init p(q|e)
00073   ASSOCRES_T pqe_all;
00074   pqe_all.resize( entityNum );
00075   for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < pqe_all.size(); entityID++ )
00076     pqe_all[entityID].resize( queryNum, 0.0 );
00077   
00078   if ( !init_ ) {
00079     LOG( logERROR ) << "Model needs to be initialized first";
00080     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );                
00081   }
00082       
00083   // +++
00084   // calculate p(q|e) for all entities and queries
00085   // +++
00086   LOG( logINFO ) << "Calculating topic-entity associations";
00087 
00088   if ( topDocNum_ > 0 )
00089     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Considering only top " << topDocNum_ << " documents per query";
00090   else 
00091     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Considering all documents per query";
00092   
00093   
00094   for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queryNum; qID++ ) {
00095     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Query #" << (qID+1) << "/" << queryNum
00096     << " ('" << queries_.queryID( qID ) << "')";
00097     
00098     //
00099     // retrieving relevant documents
00100     //
00101     LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Retrieving documents";
00102         
00103     lemur::api::IndexedRealVector pqd_all; // p(q|d) for all documents
00104     this->scoreCollection( qID, pqd_all );
00105 
00106     // STAT:
00107     // we can only estimate the operations involved in creating this ranking
00108     int qTermNum = (queries_.query( qID )).size();
00109     stat_.incOpCount( "P(t)", qTermNum );
00110     stat_.incOpCount( "docInfoList", qTermNum );
00111     
00112     // only if you want detailed statistics -- note that it slows down computation
00113     if ( DETAILED_STAT == 1 ) {
00114       const DISTR_T& q = queries_.query( qID ); // q
00115       for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00116            term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00117         lemur::api::DocInfoList* docInfoList = index_.docInfoList( term_it->first ); 
00118         docInfoList->startIteration();
00119         while ( docInfoList->hasMore() ) {
00120           lemur::api::DocInfo* dInfo = docInfoList->nextEntry();                
00121           stat_.incOpCount( "n(t,d)" );
00122         }
00123         delete docInfoList;        
00124       }
00125     }
00126     
00127     // limiting the number of documents considered
00128     if ( topDocNum_ > 0 ) 
00129       pqd_all.resize( topDocNum_ );
00130     
00131     // 
00132     // associating relevant documents with entities 
00133     //    
00134     LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Associating relevant documents with entities";
00135     
00136     for ( int i = 0; i < pqd_all.size(); i++ ) {
00137       const double& pqd = pqd_all[i].val;
00138       docID = pqd_all[i].ind;
00139       
00140       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "  DOC '" << index_.document( docID ) << "' "
00141         << "p(q|d) = " << pqd;
00142       
00143       // entities associated with docID
00144       const DISTR_T& pde_doc = entities_.docEntities( docID );
00145       stat_.incOpCount( "docEntities" );
00146       
00147       if ( pde_doc.size() > 0 ) {
00148         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    " << pde_doc.size() << " associated entities:";
00149         for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator pde_it = pde_doc.begin(); 
00150               pde_it != pde_doc.end(); pde_it++ ) {
00151           const ID_T& entityID = pde_it->first;
00152           const double& pde = pde_it->second;
00153 
00154           // p(q|e) = \sum_d p(q|d) * p(d|ca)
00155           pqe_all[entityID][qID] += (double) pqd * pde;
00156           
00157           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    ENTITY '" << entities_.entityID( entityID ) 
00158           << " (ID " << entityID << ") ";
00159           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "      p(q|e) += p(q|d) [" << pqd << "] "
00160           << "* p(d|e) [" << pde << "]  =>  p(q|e) = " << pqe_all[entityID][qID];
00161         }
00162       }
00163       else {
00164         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "    No associated entities";        
00165       }
00166     } // relevant doc at rank i
00167     
00168     // clean up
00169     pqd_all.clear();
00170   } // qID  
00171       
00172   LOG( logINFO ) << "Model 2 completed";
00173   
00174   return pqe_all;
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 
00180 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181  *  document retrieval based on Lemur' SimpleKLRetMethod
00182  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00183 void 
00184 ears::Model2::scoreCollection( const int& qID, lemur::api::IndexedRealVector& pqd_all ) 
00185 {
00186   // init retrieval method
00187   lemur::retrieval::ArrayAccumulator* accumulator 
00188     = new lemur::retrieval::ArrayAccumulator( index_.docCount() );
00189   lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLRetMethod* retMethod 
00190     = new lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLRetMethod (index_, smoothSupportFile_, *accumulator );
00191   
00192   SimpleKLParameter::DocSmoothParam docParam;  
00193   if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) {
00194     docParam.smthMethod = SimpleKLParameter::DIRICHLETPRIOR;    
00195     docParam.DirPrior = smoothingParam_;    
00196   }
00197   if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) {
00198     docParam.smthMethod = SimpleKLParameter::JELINEKMERCER;    
00199     docParam.JMLambda = smoothingParam_;    
00200   }  
00201   docParam.smthStrategy = SimpleKLParameter::INTERPOLATE;
00202   retMethod->setDocSmoothParam( docParam );
00203 
00204   SimpleKLParameter::QueryModelParam qryParam;  
00205   qryParam.adjScoreMethod = SimpleKLParameter::QUERYLIKELIHOOD;
00206   retMethod->setQueryModelParam( qryParam );
00207 
00208   // query as SimpleKLQueryModel
00209   lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLQueryModel* qModel = queries_.query( index_, qID );
00210   
00211   // score documents
00212   retMethod->scoreCollection( *qModel, pqd_all );
00213     
00214   // map log(x) values to exp(log(x)) and normalize
00215   pqd_all.LogToPosterior();
00216   
00217   // sort 
00218   pqd_all.Sort();  
00219     
00220   // clean up
00221   delete qModel;
00222   delete retMethod;
00223   delete accumulator;
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 
00228 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00229  *  alternative implementation for document retrieval from scratch
00230  *  delivers the very same scores as the implementation based on 
00231  *  Lemur' SimpleKLRetMethod
00232  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00233 /*
00234 void 
00235 ears::Model2::scoreCollection( const int& qID, lemur::api::IndexedRealVector& pqd_all ) 
00236 {
00237   double lambda = smoothingParam_;
00238   double beta = smoothingParam_;
00239   const DISTR_T& q = queries_.query( qID ); // q
00240 
00241   // caching background term probabilities
00242   LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Caching collection probabilities"; 
00243   DISTR_T pt_cache;
00244   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00245        term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00246     
00247     const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00248     double pt = (double) index_.termCount( termID ) / index_.termCount(); // p(t)
00249     pt_cache[termID] = pt;
00250   }
00251   
00252   // construct a pool of documents that need to be scored
00253   // i.e., documents that contain at least one query term
00254   LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Creating a pool of candidate documents"; 
00255   std::set< lemur::api::DOCID_T > docPool;
00256   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00257        term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00258     
00259     const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; 
00260     lemur::api::DocInfoList* dList = index_.docInfoList( termID );
00261     dList->startIteration();
00262     while ( dList->hasMore() ) {
00263       lemur::api::DocInfo* dInfo = dList->nextEntry();                
00264       docPool.insert( dInfo->docID() );      
00265     }
00266     delete dList;
00267   }
00268   
00269   // +++
00270   // scoring candidate documents
00271   // +++
00272   LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Scoring candidate documents"; 
00273   for ( std::set< lemur::api::DOCID_T >::const_iterator doc_it = docPool.begin(); 
00274         doc_it != docPool.end(); doc_it++ ) {
00275 
00276     lemur::api::DOCID_T docID = *doc_it;
00277     
00278     //
00279     // get query term frequencies in docID
00280     //
00281     std::map< int, int > ntd_cache; // n(t|d) for all query terms in docID
00282 
00283     // init
00284     for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00285          term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00286       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; 
00287       ntd_cache[termID] = 0;
00288     }
00289 
00290     // get the frequency of term t in docID
00291     // NOTE: there is no better way of it than iterating through all terms in the doc
00292     lemur::api::TermInfoList* tInfoList = index_.termInfoList( docID );
00293     tInfoList->startIteration();
00294     int queryTermsFound = 0;
00295     while ( tInfoList->hasMore() && queryTermsFound < q.size() ) {
00296       lemur::api::TermInfo* tInfo = tInfoList->nextEntry();
00297       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = tInfo->termID();      
00298       if ( pt_cache[termID] > 0 ) { // if query term
00299         ntd_cache[termID] = tInfo->count();
00300         queryTermsFound++; 
00301       }
00302     }      
00303     delete tInfoList;
00304 
00305     // compute the score for the document
00306     // log p(q|\theta_d) = \sum_{t \in q} p(t|q) * log( p(t|\theta_d) )
00307     double pqd = 0.0;
00308     int nd = index_.docLength( docID );        
00309     for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00310          term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {
00311       
00312       const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; 
00313       const double& ptq = term_it->second;
00314       const double& pt = pt_cache[termID];
00315       const int& ntd = ntd_cache[termID];
00316       double ptd; // p(t|\theta_d)
00317       
00318       // Jelinek-Mercer smoothing
00319       // p(t|\theta_d) = (1-\lambda) * p(t|d) + \lambda * p(t)
00320       if ( smoothingMethod_ == "jm" ) 
00321         ptd = (1.0 - lambda) * ((double) ntd / nd) + lambda * pt;         
00322 
00323       // Dirichlet smoothing
00324       // p(t|\theta_d) = (n(t,d) + \beta * p(t)) / (n(d) + \beta)
00325       if ( smoothingMethod_ == "dirichlet" ) 
00326         ptd = ((double) ntd + beta * pt) / ((double) nd + beta);
00327       
00328       // log p(q|\theta_d) += p(t|q) * log ( p(t|\theta_d) )
00329       pqd += (double) ptq * log( ptd );
00330     }
00331     
00332     // record value
00333     pqd_all.PushValue( docID, pqd );    
00334   } // docPool
00335 
00336   // map log(x) values to exp(log(x)) and normalize
00337    pqd_all.LogToPosterior();
00338  
00339   // sort 
00340   pqd_all.Sort();  
00341 }
00342 */
